metadata.title: CVE-2017-5193 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
The nickcmp function in Irssi before 0.8.21 allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and crash) via amessage without a nick.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5193` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

irssi - 0.8.19-1ubuntu1.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: irssi package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.8.19-1ubuntu1.3').
